alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 5:14PM CDT until June 06 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 514 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Crumrod, or 7 miles south of White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Trusten Holder WMA... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
